# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-104">機密情報の種類のエンティティ定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-105">コンプライアンスセンターのデータ損失防止 (DLP) には、DLP ポリシーで使用できる、さまざまな機密情報の種類が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-106">このトピックでは、機密情報の種類をすべて一覧表示し、各種類を検出したときに DLP ポリシーが調査する内容を示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-107">機密情報の種類はパターンで定義され、正規表現または関数で識別できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-108">機密情報の種類はさらに、キーワードやチェックサムなどの確証的な証拠を使用して識別することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-109">また、評価プロセスでは信頼度や近接度も使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-110">機密情報の種類には、次のいずれかのサブスクリプションが必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-113">ABA ルーティング番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-114">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-115">書式設定された、または書式設定されていないパターン内の9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-116">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-117">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-118">0、1、2、3、6、7、または8で始まる4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-119">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-120">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-121">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-122">1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-123">書式なし: 0、1、2、3、6、7、または8で始まる9桁の連続した数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-124">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-125">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-126">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-127">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-128">関数 Func_aba_routing がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-130">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-131">関数 Func_aba_routing がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-144">ルーティング番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-144">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-145">ルーティング番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-145">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-146">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-146">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-147">承認#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-147">routing#</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-149">アルゼンチンの国民 id (DNI) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-150">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-151">8桁の数字、ピリオドなし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-152">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-153">8 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-154">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-155">省略可能な期間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-156">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-157">省略可能な期間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-158">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-159">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-160">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-161">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-162">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-163">正規表現 Regex_argentina_national_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-164">Keyword_argentina_national_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-169">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-169">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-170">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-171">documento nacional de 識別子 dad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-171">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-172">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-172">documento número</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-175">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-175">rnp</span></span> 
   
## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-176">オーストラリアの銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-177">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-178">6桁から10桁の数字、銀行の州の支店番号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-179">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-180">アカウント番号は 6 ~ 10 桁です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-181">オーストラリアの銀行の州支店番号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-182">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-183">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-184">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-185">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-186">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-187">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-188">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-189">正規表現 Regex_australia_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-191">正規表現 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-192">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-193">正規表現 Regex_australia_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-195">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-195">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-197">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-197">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-198">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-198">correspondent bank</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-199">base currency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-199">base currency</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-200">usa account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-200">usa account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-201">holder address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-201">holder address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-202">bank address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-202">bank address</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-210">オーストラリアの勤務先番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-211">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-212">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-213">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-214">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-215">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-217">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-218">11桁の数字 (オプションの区切り記号)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-219">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-220">11桁の数字 (オプションの区切り記号):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-221">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-222">省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-223">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-224">省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-225">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-226">省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-227">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-228">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-229">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-230">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-231">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-232">関数 Func_australian_business_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-233">Keywords_australian_business_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-234">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-235">関数 Func_australian_business_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_business_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-237">Keyword_australia_business_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-237">Keyword_australia_business_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-238">オーストラリアの営業番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-238">australia business no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-239">ビジネス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-239">business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-240">abn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-240">abn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-241">businessid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-241">businessid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-242">ビジネス id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-242">business id</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-245">オーストラリアの会社番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-246">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-247">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-248">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-249">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-250">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-252">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-253">区切り文字を含む9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-254">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-255">区切り文字を含む9桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-256">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-257">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-258">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-259">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-260">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-261">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-262">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-263">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-264">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-265">関数 Func_Australian_Company_Number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-266">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-267">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-268">関数 Func_Australian_Company_Number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-269">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-269">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-270">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-270">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-271">使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-271">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-272">オーストラリアの会社番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-272">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-273">オーストラリアの会社番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-273">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-274">オーストラリアの会社番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-274">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-275">オーストラリアの会社番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-275">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-276">オーストラリアの会社番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-276">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-277">オーストラリアの会社番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-277">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-278">オーストラリアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-279">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-280">9桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-281">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-282">9桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-283">2桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-284">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-285">5桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-286">または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-287">1 ~ 2 個の省略可能な文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-288">4 ~ 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-289">または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-290">9桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-291">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-292">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-293">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-294">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-295">正規表現 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-296">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-297">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-298">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-298">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-299">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-299">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-300">international driving permits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-300">international driving permits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-301">australian automobile association</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-301">australian automobile association</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-302">international driving permit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-302">international driving permit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-303">DriverLicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-303">DriverLicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-304">DriverLicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-304">DriverLicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-305">Driver Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-305">Driver Lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-306">Driver Licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-306">Driver Licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-307">Driver Licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-307">Driver Licences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-308">DriversLic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-308">DriversLic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-309">その他のライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-309">DriversLicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-310">DriversLicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-310">DriversLicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-311">Drivers Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-311">Drivers Lic</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-397">オーストラリアの医療口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-398">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-399">10 ～ 11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-400">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-401">10 ～ 11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-402">最初の桁は2-6 の範囲内にあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-403">9桁目はチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-404">10桁目は問題の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-405">11桁目 (省略可能) は、個々の番号です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-406">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-407">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-408">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-409">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-410">関数 Func_australian_medical_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-411">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-412">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-413">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-413">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-415">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-416">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-416">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-417">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-418">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-418">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-419">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-419">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-420">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-420">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-421">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-421">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-422">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-422">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-423">medicare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-423">medicare</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-424">オーストラリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-425">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-426">1 桁の文字の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-427">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-428">1 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-429">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-430">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-431">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-432">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-433">正規表現 Regex_australia_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-434">Keyword_passport または Keyword_australia_passport_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-435">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-435">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-436">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-436">Keyword_passport</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-468">オーストラリアの税ファイル番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-469">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-470">8 ~ 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-471">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-472">8 ~ 9 桁の数字は、通常、次のようにスペースで表されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-473">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-474">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-475">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-476">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-477">2 ~ 3 桁の数字。最後の桁はチェックディジットです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-478">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-479">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-480">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-481">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-482">関数 Func_australian_tax_file_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-483">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number または Keyword_number_exclusions のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-484">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-487">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-487">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-488">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-488">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-489">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-490">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-490">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-491">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-491">service veterans</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-494">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-494">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-495">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-495">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-496">オーストリアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-497">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-498">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-499">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-500">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-501">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-502">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-503">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-504">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-505">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-506">正規表現は、  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-507">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-634">オーストリアの id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-634">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-635">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-635">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-636">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-636">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-637">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-637">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-638">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-638">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-639">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-639">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-641">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-642">24文字の文字、数字、特殊文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-642">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-643">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-644">24文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-644">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="f387c-645">22文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)、数字、円記号、スラッシュ、またはプラス記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-645">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-646">2つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)、数字、バックスラッシュ、スラッシュ、プラス記号、または等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-646">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-647">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-648">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-648">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-649">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-650">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-650">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-651">正規表現は、  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-651">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-652">From キーワード  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-652">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-653">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-655">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-655">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-656">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-656">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-657">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-657">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-658">オーストリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-658">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-659">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号 sensitiveinformation タイプでのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-660">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-661">1文字の後にオプションのスペースと7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-661">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-662">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-663">1つの文字、7桁の数字、および1つのスペースの組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-663">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-664">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-664">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-665">スペース1つ (オプション)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-665">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-666">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-666">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-667">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-668">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-668">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-669">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-670">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-671">正規表現は、  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-671">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-672">From キーワード  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-672">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-673">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-673">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-674">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-674">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-675">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-675">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-676">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-676">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-677">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-677">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-678">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-678">passports</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-693">オーストリアの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-693">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-694">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-694">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-695">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-696">指定した形式の10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-696">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-697">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-698">10 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-698">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-699">シリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-699">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-700">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-700">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-701">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-701">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-702">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-702">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-703">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-703">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-704">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-704">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-705">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-705">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-706">関数 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-706">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-707">_or_equivalent ' は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-707">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-708">from キーワード  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-709">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-710">関数は、  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-724">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-724">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-725">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-725">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-726">オーストリアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-726">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-727">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-728">任意指定のハイフンとスラッシュ (/) を含む9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-728">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-729">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-730">任意指定のハイフンとスラッシュ (/) を含む9桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-730">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-731">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-731">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-732">ハイフン1つ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-733">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-733">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-734">スラッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-734">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-735">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-735">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-736">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-737">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-738">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-739">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-740">関数は、  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-740">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-741">From キーワード  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-741">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-742">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-742">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-743">関数は、  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-743">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-766">オーストリアの付加価値税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-766">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-767">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-767">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-768">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-768">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-769">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-769">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-770">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-770">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-771">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-771">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-773">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-774">11文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-774">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-775">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-776">11文字の英数字パターン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-776">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-777">A または a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-777">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-778">T または t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-778">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-779">オプションスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-779">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-780">U または u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-780">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-781">オプションスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-781">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-782">2桁または3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-782">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-783">オプションスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-783">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-784">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-784">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-785">オプションスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-785">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-786">1桁または2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-786">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-787">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-788">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-789">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-790">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-791">関数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-791">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-792">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-792">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-793">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-794">関数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-794">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-800">vat 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-800">vat no.</span></span>
