## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-812">Azure DocumentDB 認証キー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-812">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-813">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-814">文字列 "DocumentDb" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-814">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-815">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-815">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-816">文字列 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-816">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-817">3-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-817">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-818">より大きい記号 (>)、等号 (=)、引用符 (")、またはアポストロフィ (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-818">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-819">86の小文字または小文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、またはプラス記号 (+) の任意の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-819">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-820">2つの等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-820">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-821">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-822">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-822">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-823">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-824">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-825">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-825">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-826">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-826">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-827">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-827">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-828">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-828">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-829">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-829">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-830">拠点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-830">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-831">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-831">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-832">ノース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-832">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-833">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-833">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-834">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-834">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-835">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-835">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-836">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-836">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-837">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-837">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-838">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-838">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-839">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-839">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-840">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-840">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-841">Azure IAAS データベースの接続文字列と Azure SQL 接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-841">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-842">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-843">文字列 "Server"、"server"、または "data source" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列を指定します (文字列 "cloudapp" を含む)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-843">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-844">com または "cloudapp azure。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-844">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-845">net "または" database "です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-845">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-846">net "、および" Password "または" pwd "という文字列を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-846">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-847">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-847">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-848">文字列 "Server"、"server"、または "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-848">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-849">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-850">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-851">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-852">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-852">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-853">文字列 "cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-853">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-854">com "," cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-854">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-855">net "、または" database "です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-855">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-856">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-856">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-857">1-300 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-857">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-858">文字列 "Password"、"password"、または "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-858">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-859">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-860">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-861">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-862">セミコロンではない1つ以上の文字 (;)、引用符 (")、またはアポストロフィ (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-862">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-863">セミコロン (;)、引用符 (")、またはアポストロフィ (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-863">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-864">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-865">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-865">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-866">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-867">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-868">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-868">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-869">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-869">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-872">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-872">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-884">Azure IoT 接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-884">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-885">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-886">文字列 "HostName" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列 ("azure デバイス" を含む)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-886">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-887">net "および" SharedAccessKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-887">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-888">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-888">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-889">文字列 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-889">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-890">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-890">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-891">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-891">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-892">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-892">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-893">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-893">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-894">文字列 "azure デバイス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-894">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-895">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-895">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-896">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-896">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-897">文字列 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-897">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-898">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-899">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-899">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-900">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-900">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-901">43の小文字または小文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、またはプラス記号 (+) の任意の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-901">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-902">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-903">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-903">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-904">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-904">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-905">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-905">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-906">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-906">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-907">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-907">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-908">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-908">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-923">Azure 発行設定パスワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-923">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-924">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-925">文字列 "userpwd =" に続けて英数字の文字列を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-925">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-926">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-926">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-927">文字列 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-927">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-928">60小文字または数字の任意の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-928">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-929">二重引用符 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-929">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-930">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-931">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-931">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-932">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-933">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-934">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-934">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-935">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-935">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-950">Azure Redis cache 接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-950">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-951">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-952">文字列 "redis...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-952">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-953">net "の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列を指定します。文字列" password "または" pwd "が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-953">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-954">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-954">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-955">文字列 "redis...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-955">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-956">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-956">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-957">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-958">文字列 "password" または "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-958">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-959">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-959">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-960">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-960">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-961">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-961">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-962">43文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-962">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-963">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-964">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-965">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-966">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-967">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-968">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-968">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-969">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-969">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-984">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-984">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-985">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-986">文字列 "sig" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-986">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-987">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-987">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-988">文字列 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-988">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-989">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-989">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-990">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-990">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-991">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-991">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-992">43-53 文字のうち、下位または大文字の文字、数字、またはパーセント記号 (%) の任意の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-992">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-993">文字列 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-993">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-994">小文字または大文字、数字、パーセント記号 (%) 以外の文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-994">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-995">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-996">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-997">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-998">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-998">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-999">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-999">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1000">Azure service bus の接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1000">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1001">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1002">文字列 "EndPoint" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1002">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1003">net "および" Shared' キー "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1003">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1004">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1004">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1005">文字列 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1005">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1006">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1006">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1007">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1007">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1008">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1008">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1009">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1010">文字列 "windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1010">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1011">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1011">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1012">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1012">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1013">文字列 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1013">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1014">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1014">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1015">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1016">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1016">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1017">43文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1017">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1018">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1018">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1019">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1020">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1021">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1022">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1022">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1023">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1023">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1024">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1024">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1031">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1031">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1032">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1032">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1033">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1033">localhost</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1037">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1037">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1038">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1038">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1039">Azure ストレージアカウントキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1039">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1040">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1041">文字列 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" の後に、文字列 "AccountKey" を含む、次のパターンで概説されている文字および文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1041">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1042">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1042">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1043">文字列 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1043">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1044">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1044">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1045">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1045">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1046">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1046">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1047">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1047">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1048">文字列 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1048">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1049">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1049">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1050">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1050">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1051">0 ~ 2 個の空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1051">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1052">86文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1052">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1053">2つの等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1053">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1054">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1055">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1055">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1056">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1057">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1058">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1058">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1059">正規表現 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1059">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1060">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1060">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1066">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1066">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1067">拠点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1067">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1069">ノース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1069">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1070">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1070">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1071">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1071">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1076">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1076">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1077">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1077">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1078">Azure ストレージアカウントキー (汎用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1078">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1079">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1080">86の下または大文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、またはプラス記号 (+) の任意の組み合わせで、下のパターンで説明されている文字が前または後にある。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1080">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1081">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1081">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1082">0から大なり記号 (>)、アポストロフィ (')、等号 (=)、引用符 (")、または番号記号 (#) のいずれか1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1082">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1083">86文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1083">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1084">2つの等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1084">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1085">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1086">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1086">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1087">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1088">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1088">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1089">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1089">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1090">ベルギーの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1090">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1091">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1091">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1092">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1093">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1093">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1094">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1095">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1095">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1096">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1097">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1097">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1098">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1099">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1099">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1100">正規表現は、  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1100">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1101">またはのキーワードが `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1101">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1234">ベルギーの国番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1234">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1235">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1236">11桁の数字とオプションの区切り記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1236">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1237">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1238">11 の数字と区切り文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1238">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1239">YY 形式の6桁の数字と2つのオプションのピリオド。Tu.生年月日の DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1239">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1240">ドット、ダッシュ、スペースからのオプションの区切り記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1240">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1241">3桁の連続した数字 (男性の場合は奇数、女性の場合も同様)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1241">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1242">ドット、ダッシュ、スペースからのオプションの区切り記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1242">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1243">2つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1243">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1244">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1245">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1246">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1247">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1248">関数 Func_belgium_national_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1248">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1249">Keyword_belgium_national_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1249">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1250">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1250">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1251">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1251">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1252">関数 Func_belgium_national_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1252">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1253">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1253">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1312">ベルギーのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1312">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1313">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1313">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1314">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1315">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号を付けない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1315">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1316">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1317">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1317">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1318">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1319">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1319">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1320">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1321">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1322">正規表現は、  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1322">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1323">From キーワード  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1323">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1324">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1324">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1325">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1325">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1326">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1326">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1327">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1327">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1328">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1328">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1329">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1329">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1330">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1330">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1331">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1331">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1332">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1332">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1333">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1333">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1347">ベルギーの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1347">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1348">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1348">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1349">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1350">11桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り文字なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1350">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1351">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1352">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1352">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1353">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1354">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1354">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1355">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1356">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1357">関数は、  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1357">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1358">From キーワード  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1358">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1359">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1359">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1360">関数は、  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1360">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1365">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1365">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1366">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1366">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1367">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1367">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1368">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1368">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1369">nationalnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1369">nationalnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1373">personalidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1373">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1374">numéro national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1374">numéro national</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1375">numéro de sécurité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1375">numéro de sécurité</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1379">numéronational#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1379">numéronational#</span></span>


## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1380">ベルギーの付加価値税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1380">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1381">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1382">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1383">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1384">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1385">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1386">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1387">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1388">12文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1388">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1389">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1390">12文字の英数字パターン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1390">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1391">a 文字 B または b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1391">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1392">文字 E または e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1392">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1393">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1393">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1394">1から9までの数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1394">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1395">省略可能なドットまたはハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1395">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1396">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1396">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1397">省略可能なドットまたはハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1397">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1398">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1398">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1399">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1400">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1400">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1401">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1402">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1403">関数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1403">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1404">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1404">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1405">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1406">関数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1406">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1407">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1407">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1408">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1408">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1409">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1409">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1410">vat 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1410">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1411">vat 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1411">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1412">numéro。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1412">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1413">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1413">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1414">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1414">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1415">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1415">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1416">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1416">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1417">過誤#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1417">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1418">ブラジルの CPF 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1418">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1419">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1420">書式設定ありまたは書式設定なしのチェック ディジットを含む 11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1420">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1421">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1422">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1422">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1423">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1423">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1424">ピリオド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1424">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1425">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1425">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1426">ピリオド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1426">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1427">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1427">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1428">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1428">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1429">2桁の数字 (チェックディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1429">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1430">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1430">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1431">11 桁の数字 (最後の 2 桁はチェック ディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1431">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1432">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1433">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1434">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1435">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1436">関数 Func_brazil_cpf は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1436">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1437">Keyword_brazil_cpf からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1437">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1438">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1438">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1439">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1440">関数 Func_brazil_cpf は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1440">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1441">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1441">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1444">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1444">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1451">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1451">Inscrição</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1453">ブラジルの法人番号 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1453">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1454">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1455">登録番号、枝番号、チェック ディジット、および区切り文字を含む 14 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1455">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1456">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1457">14 桁の数字と区切り文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1457">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1458">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1458">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1459">ピリオド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1459">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1460">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1461">ピリオド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1461">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1462">3桁の数字 (これらの最初の8桁の数字は登録番号です)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1462">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1463">スラッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1463">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1464">4桁の支店番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1464">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1465">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1465">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1466">2桁の数字 (チェックディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1466">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1467">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1467">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1468">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1468">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1469">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1469">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1470">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1470">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1471">関数 Func_brazil_cnpj は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1471">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1472">Keyword_brazil_cnpj からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1472">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1473">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1473">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1474">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1475">関数 Func_brazil_cnpj は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1475">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1476">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1476">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1477">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1477">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1478">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1478">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1479">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1479">CNPJ</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1481">CNPJ-MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1481">CNPJ-MF</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1482">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1482">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1483">Taxpayers Registry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1483">Taxpayers Registry</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1484">Legal entity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1484">Legal entity</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1485">Legal entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1485">Legal entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1486">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1486">Registration Status</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1487">Business</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1487">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1488">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1488">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1489">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1489">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1490">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1490">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1491">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1491">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1492">CGC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1492">CGC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1493">Pessoa jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1493">Pessoa jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1494">Pessoas jurídicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1494">Pessoas jurídicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1495">Situação cadastral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1495">Situação cadastral</span></span>
