- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1497">サイト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1497">Empresa</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1498">ブラジルの国民識別カード (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1498">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1499">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1500">Registro Geral (古い形式): 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1500">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1501">Registro de 識別子 Dade (RIC) (新しい形式):11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1501">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1502">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1503">Registro Geral (従来の形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1503">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1504">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1504">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1505">ピリオド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1505">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1506">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1507">ピリオド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1507">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1508">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1509">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1509">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1510">チェックディジットである1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1510">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1511">Registro de 識別子 Dade (RIC) (新しい形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1511">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1512">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1512">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1513">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1513">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1514">チェックディジットである1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1514">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1515">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1516">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1517">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1518">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1519">関数 Func_brazil_rg は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1519">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1520">Keyword_brazil_rg からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1520">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1521">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1522">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1523">関数 Func_brazil_rg は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1523">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1524">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1525">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1525">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1526">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1526">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1527">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1527">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1528">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1528">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1529">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1529">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1530">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1530">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1531">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1531">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1532">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1532">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1533">RG (このキーワードでは大文字と小文字が区別されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1533">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1534">RIC (このキーワードでは大文字と小文字が区別されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1534">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1535">ブルガリアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1535">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1536">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1537">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1538">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1538">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1539">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1540">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1540">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1541">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1542">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1543">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1544">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1545">正規表現は、  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1545">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1546">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1546">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1673">ブルガリアの一様な民事訴訟番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1673">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1674">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1674">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1675">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1675">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1676">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1676">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1677">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1677">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1678">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1678">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1679">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1679">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1680">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1681">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1681">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1682">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1683">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1683">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1684">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1684">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1685">誕生日の順序に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1685">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1686">性別に対応する1桁の数字: 男性の偶数桁で、女性に奇数の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1686">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1687">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1687">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1688">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1689">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1689">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1690">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1691">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1691">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1692">関数は、  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1692">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1693">From キーワード  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1693">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1694">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1694">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1695">関数は、  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1695">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1740">ブルガリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1740">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1741">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1741">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1742">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1743">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1743">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1744">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1745">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1745">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1746">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1747">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1747">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1748">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1749">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1749">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1750">正規表現は、  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1750">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1751">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1751">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1752">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1752">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1754">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1754">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1755">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1755">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1756">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1756">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1757">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1757">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1758">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1758">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1759">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1759">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1760">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1760">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1761">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1761">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1762">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1762">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1763">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1763">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1764">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1764">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1765">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1765">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1766">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1766">номер на паспорт</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1768">カナダの銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1768">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1769">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1770">7桁または12桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1770">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1771">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1772">カナダの銀行口座番号は 7 桁または 12 桁の数字です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1772">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1773">カナダの銀行口座転送番号は次のとおりです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1773">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1774">5桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1774">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1775">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1775">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1776">3桁の数字または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1776">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1777">ゼロ「0」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1777">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1778">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1778">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1779">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1780">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1780">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1781">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1782">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1782">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1783">正規表現 Regex_canada_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1783">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1784">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1784">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1785">正規表現 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1785">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1786">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1787">正規表現 Regex_canada_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1787">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1788">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1788">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1812">カナダの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1812">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1813">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1814">州によって異なります</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1814">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1815">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1815">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1816">アルバータ州、ブリティッシュ コロンビア州、マニトバ州、ニュー ブランズウィック州、ニューファンドランド・ラブラドール州、ノバスコシア州、オンタリオ州、プリンス エドワード アイランド州、ケベック州、およびサスカチュワン州の各種パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1816">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1817">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1818">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1819">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1820">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1820">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1821">関数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1821">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1822">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1822">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1823">Keyword_canada_drivers_license のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1823">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1959">カナダの正常性サービス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1959">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1960">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1961">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1961">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1962">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1963">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1963">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1964">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1965">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1966">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1967">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1967">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1968">正規表現 Regex_canada_health_service_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1968">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1969">Keyword_canada_health_service_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1969">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1970">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1970">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1971">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1971">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1972">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1972">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1973">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1973">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1974">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1974">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1975">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1975">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1976">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1976">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1977">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1977">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1978">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1978">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1979">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1979">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1980">身体</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1980">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1981">カナダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1981">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1982">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1983">2つの大文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1983">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1984">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1985">2つの大文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1985">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1986">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1987">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1987">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1988">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-1989">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1990">正規表現 Regex_canada_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1990">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1991">Keyword_canada_passport_number または Keyword_passport からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1991">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1992">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1992">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-1993">Keyword_canada_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1993">Keyword_canada_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1997">passport photos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1997">passport photos</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-1999">canadian citizens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-1999">canadian citizens</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2000">processing times</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2000">processing times</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2001">renewal application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2001">renewal application</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2002">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2002">Keyword_passport</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2021">カナダの個人正常性識別番号 (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2021">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2022">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2022">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2023">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2023">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2024">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2025">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2025">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2026">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2027">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2027">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2028">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2029">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2030">正規表現 Regex_canada_phin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2030">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2031">Keyword_canada_phin または Keyword_canada_provinces から、少なくとも2つのキーワードが見つかります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2031">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2064">カナダの社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2064">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2065">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2066">9桁の数字 (オプションのハイフンまたはスペースあり)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2066">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2067">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2068">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2068">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2069">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2069">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2070">ハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2070">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2071">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2071">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2072">ハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2072">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2073">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2073">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2074">書式なし: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2074">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2075">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2076">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2076">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2077">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2078">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2079">関数 Func_canadian_sin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2079">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2080">以下の 2 つ以上の条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2080">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2081">Keyword_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2081">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2082">Keyword_sin_collaborative のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2082">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2083">関数 Func_eu_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2083">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2084">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2084">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2085">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2086">関数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2086">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2087">Keyword_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2087">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2088">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2088">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2089">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2089">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2090">Keyword_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2090">Keyword_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2094">大罪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2094">sins</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2098">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2098">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2099">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2099">national identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2100">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2100">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2101">sin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2101">sin#</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2113">チリ id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2113">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2114">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2115">7桁から8桁の数字、チェックディジットまたは文字の区切り記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2115">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2116">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2117">7 ~ 8 桁の数字と区切り記号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2117">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2118">1 ~ 2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2118">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2119">省略可能な期間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2119">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2120">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2120">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2121">省略可能な期間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2121">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2122">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2122">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2123">ダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2123">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2124">チェックディジットの1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2124">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2125">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2126">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2126">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2127">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2128">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2129">関数 Func_chile_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2129">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2130">Keyword_chile_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2130">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2131">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2132">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2132">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2133">関数 Func_chile_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2133">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2134">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2171">中国の居住アイデンティティカード (PRC) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2171">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2172">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2173">18 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2173">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2174">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2175">18 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2175">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2176">住所コードの6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2176">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2177">YYYYMMDD 形式の日付で、生年月日の8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2177">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2178">注文コードである3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2178">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2179">チェックディジットである1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2179">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2180">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2181">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2182">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2183">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2184">関数 Func_china_resident_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2184">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2185">Keyword_china_resident_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2185">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2186">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2187">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2188">関数 Func_china_resident_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2188">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2189">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2189">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2190">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2190">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2191">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2191">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2192">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2192">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2193">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2193">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2194">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2194">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2195">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2195">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2196">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2196">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2197">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2197">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2198">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2198">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2199">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2199">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2200">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2200">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2201">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2201">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2202">クレジット カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2202">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2203">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2204">書式設定または書式設定なし (dddddddddddddddd) で、Luhn テストに合格する必要がある14から16桁の数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2204">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2205">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2206">世界規模の主要ブランドのカード (Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、ギフト カード、Dinars Club Card など) を検出する非常に複雑で信頼性の高いパターンです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2206">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2207">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2208">あり (Luhn のチェックサム)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2208">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2209">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2210">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2210">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2211">関数 Func_credit_card がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2212">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2212">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2213">Keyword_cc_verification のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2213">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2214">Keyword_cc_name からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2214">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2215">関数 Func_expiration_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2215">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2216">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2216">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2217">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2217">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2218">関数 Func_credit_card がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2218">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2219">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2220">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2220">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_cc_verification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2221">Keyword_cc_verification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2221">Keyword_cc_verification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2222">card verification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2222">card verification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2223">card identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2223">card identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2224">cvn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2224">cvn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2225">cid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2225">cid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2226">cvc2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2226">cvc2</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2479">クロアチアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2479">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2480">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2480">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2481">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2482">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2482">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2483">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2484">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2484">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2485">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2486">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2486">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2487">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2488">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2489">正規表現は、  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2489">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2490">またはのキーワードが `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2490">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2614">クロアチアの id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2614">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2615">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2615">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2616">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2617">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2617">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2618">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2619">9桁の連続した数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2619">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2620">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2621">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2622">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2623">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2624">関数 Func_croatia_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2624">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2625">Keyword_croatia_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2625">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2656">クロアチアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2656">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2657">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2658">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2659">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2659">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2660">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2661">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2661">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2662">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2663">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2663">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2664">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2665">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2665">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2666">正規表現は、  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2666">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2667">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2667">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2672">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2672">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2673">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2673">passports</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2685">クロアチア個人識別 (OIB) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2685">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2686">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2687">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2687">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2688">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2689">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2689">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2690">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2690">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2691">最終桁はチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2691">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2692">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2693">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2694">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2695">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2696">関数 Func_croatia_oib_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2697">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2697">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2698">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2699">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2700">関数 Func_croatia_oib_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2700">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2701">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2701">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2732">クロアチアの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2732">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2733">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2733">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2734">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2734">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2735">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2735">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2736">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2736">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2737">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2737">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2738">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2738">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2739">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2739">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2740">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2741">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2741">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2742">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2743">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2743">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2744">関数は、  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2744">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2745">From キーワード  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2745">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2746">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2747">関数は、  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2747">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2764">キプロス drivers ライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2764">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2765">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2766">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2767">12桁の数字 (スペースと区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2767">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2768">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2769">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2769">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2770">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2771">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2771">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2772">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2773">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2774">正規表現は、  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2774">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2775">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2775">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
