## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2900">キプロス id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2900">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2901">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2901">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2902">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2902">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2903">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2903">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2904">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2904">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2905">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2905">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2906">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2906">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2907">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2908">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2908">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2909">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2910">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2910">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2911">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2912">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2912">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2913">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2914">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2915">正規表現は、  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2915">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2916">From キーワード  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2916">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2917">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2917">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2918">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2918">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2919">id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2919">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2920">id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2920">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2921">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2921">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2922">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2922">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2923">個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2923">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2924">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2924">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2925">キプロスパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2925">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2926">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2927">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2928">1文字の後に、スペースまたは区切り記号を含まない6-8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2928">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2929">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2930">1文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2930">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2931">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2932">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2932">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2933">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2934">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2935">正規表現は、  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2935">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2936">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2936">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2962">キプロス税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2962">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2963">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2963">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2964">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2964">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2965">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2965">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2966">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2966">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2967">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2967">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2968">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2968">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2969">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2970">指定したパターンの8桁の数字と1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2970">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2971">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2972">8桁の数字と1つの文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2972">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2973">"0" または "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2973">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2974">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2974">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2975">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2975">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2976">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2977">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2977">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-2978">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2979">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2980">関数は、  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2980">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2981">From キーワード  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2981">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-2982">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-2983">関数は、  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-2983">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3011">チェコドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3011">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3012">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3013">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3014">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3014">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3015">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3016">8つの文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3016">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3017">文字 ' E ' (大文字と小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3017">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3018">レター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3018">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3019">スペース (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3019">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3020">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3020">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3021">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3022">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3023">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3024">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3024">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3025">正規表現は、  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3025">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3026">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3152">チェコのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3152">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3153">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3153">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3154">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3155">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3156">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3157">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3158">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3159">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3160">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3161">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3161">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3162">正規表現は、  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3163">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3182">チェコの個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3182">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3183">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3184">省略可能なスラッシュ (old 形式) を含む9桁の数字。省略可能なスラッシュ (新しい形式)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3184">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3185">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3186">9桁の数字 (古い形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3186">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3187">生年月日を表す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3187">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3188">省略可能なスラッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3188">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3189">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3189">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3190">10桁の数字 (新しい形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3190">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3191">生年月日を表す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3191">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3192">省略可能なスラッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3192">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3193">4桁の数字 (最後の桁はチェックディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3193">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3194">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3195">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3196">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3197">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3198">関数 Func_czech_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3198">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3199">Keyword_czech_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3199">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3200">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3201">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3202">関数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3202">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3203">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3250">チェコ語のソーシャルセキュリティ番号または同等の識別情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3250">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3251">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3251">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3252">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3253">指定したパターンの10桁の数字と円記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3253">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3254">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3255">10桁の数字と円記号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3255">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3256">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3256">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3257">円記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3257">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3258">同じ日付で個人の出生を区切るシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3258">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3259">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3259">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3260">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3261">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3261">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3262">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3263">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3263">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3264">関数は、  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3264">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3265">From キーワード  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3265">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3266">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3267">関数は、  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3267">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3277">国番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3277">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3278">個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3278">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3279">personalidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3279">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3280">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3280">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3281">rodnéčíslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3281">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3282">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3282">rodne cislo</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3283">デンマークの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3283">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3284">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3284">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3285">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3286">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3286">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3287">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3288">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3288">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3289">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3290">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3290">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3291">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3292">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3292">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3293">正規表現は、  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3293">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3294">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3294">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3295">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3295">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3296">Keywords_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3296">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3418">デンマークのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3418">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3419">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3419">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3420">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3421">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3421">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3422">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3423">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3423">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3424">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3425">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3426">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3427">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3428">正規表現は、  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3428">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3429">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3429">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3446">デンマークの個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3446">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3447">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3448">10桁の数字 (ハイフンを含む)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3448">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3449">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3450">10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3450">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3451">DDMMYY という形式の誕生日を示す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3451">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3452">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3452">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3453">4桁の数字 (最後の桁はチェックディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3453">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3454">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3455">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3456">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3457">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3458">正規表現 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3458">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3459">Keyword_denmark_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3459">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3460">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3460">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3461">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3461">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3462">正規表現 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3462">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3463">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3463">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3535">デンマークの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3535">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3536">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類のみを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3537">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3538">指定したパターンの10桁の数字とハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3538">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3539">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3540">10桁の数字とハイフン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3540">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3541">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3541">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3542">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3542">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3543">シーケンス番号に対応する4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3543">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3544">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3545">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3546">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3547">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3547">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3548">関数は、  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3548">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3549">From キーワード  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3549">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3550">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3551">関数は、  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3551">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3556">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3556">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3565">医薬品執行機関 (DEA) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3565">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3566">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3567">2文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3567">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3568">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3569">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3569">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3570">次の一連の文字から成る1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない): abcdefghjklmnprstux (登録されているコード)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3570">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3571">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)。登録者の姓または数字 ' 9 ' の最初の文字です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3571">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3572">7桁の数字 (最後の桁はチェックディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3572">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3573">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3574">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3574">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3575">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3576">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3576">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3577">関数 Func_dea_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3577">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3578">From キーワード `Keyword_dea_number` が見つかりました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3578">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3579">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3579">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3580">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3580">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3581">関数 Func_dea_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3581">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3582">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3582">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3583">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3583">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3584">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3584">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3585">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3585">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3586">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3586">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3587">薬物の強制管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3587">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3588">医薬処置エージェンシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3588">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3589">エストニアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3589">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3590">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3591">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3592">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3592">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3593">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3594">2つの文字と6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3594">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3595">文字 "ET" (大文字と小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3595">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3596">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3596">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3597">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3598">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3599">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3600">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3601">正規表現は、  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3601">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3602">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3728">エストニア個人識別コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3728">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3729">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3729">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3730">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3730">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3731">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3731">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3732">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3732">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3733">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3733">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3734">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3734">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3735">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3736">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3736">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3737">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3738">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3738">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3739">性別と世紀に対応する1桁の数字 (奇数個の男性、偶数の女性、1-2:19 世紀、3-4:20 世紀、5-6:21 世紀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3739">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3740">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3740">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3741">同じ日付に出生地を分けるシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3741">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3742">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3742">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3743">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3744">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3744">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3745">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3746">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3746">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3747">関数は、  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3747">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3748">From キーワード  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3748">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3749">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3749">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3750">関数は、  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3750">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3783">エストニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3783">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3784">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3784">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3785">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3786">1文字の後に7桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3786">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3787">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3788">1文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3788">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3789">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3790">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3790">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3791">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3792">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3792">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3793">正規表現は、  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3793">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3794">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3794">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3809">EU のデビット カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3809">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3810">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3811">16 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3811">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3812">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3813">非常に複雑で信頼性の高いパターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3813">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3814">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3815">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3815">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-3816">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-3817">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3818">関数 Func_eu_debit_card がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3818">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3819">次の条件のうち 1 つ以上に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3819">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3820">Keyword_eu_debit_card のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3820">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3821">Keyword_card_terms_dict のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3821">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3822">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3822">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3823">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3823">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3824">関数 Func_expiration_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3824">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-3825">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-3825">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4271">フィンランドの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4271">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4272">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4272">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4273">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4273">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4274">10桁の数字とハイフンを含む文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4274">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4275">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4275">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4276">ハイフンを含む10桁の数字と文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4276">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4277">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4277">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4278">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4278">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4279">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4279">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4280">1桁の数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4280">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4281">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4282">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4283">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4284">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4285">正規表現は、  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4285">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4286">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4417">フィンランドの欧州医療保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4417">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4418">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4419">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4420">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4421">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4422">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4423">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4424">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4425">20桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4425">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4426">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4427">20桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4427">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4428">10桁の数字-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4428">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4429">オプションのスペースまたはハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4429">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4430">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4430">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4431">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4432">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4432">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4433">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4434">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4435">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4435">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4436">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4436">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4454">フィンランドの国民 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4454">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4455">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4456">6桁の数字、世紀を示す文字、3桁の数字、およびチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4456">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4457">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4458">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4458">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4459">DDMMYY という形式の生年月日を示す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4459">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4460">世紀マーカー (「-」、「+」、または「a」)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4460">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4461">3桁の個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4461">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4462">チェックディジットとしての1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4462">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4463">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4464">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4465">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4466">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4467">関数 Func_finnish_national_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4467">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4468">Keyword_finnish_national_id からのキーワードが見つかりました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4468">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4469">チェックサムパス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4469">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4470">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4470">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4471">関数 Func_finnish_national_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4471">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4472">チェックサムパス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4472">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4521">フィンランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4521">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4522">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類で利用でき、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4522">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4523">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4523">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4524">9桁の文字と数字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4524">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4525">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4525">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4526">9つの文字と数字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4526">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4527">2文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4527">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4528">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4528">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4529">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4530">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4531">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-4532">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4532">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4533">正規表現 Regex_finland_passport_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4533">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4534">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common または Keyword_finland_passport_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4534">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4535">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4535">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4536">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4536">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4537">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4537">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4538">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4538">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4539">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4539">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4540">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4540">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4541">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4541">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4542">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4542">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4543">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4543">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4544">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4544">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4545">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4545">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4546">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4546">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-4547">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4547">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4548">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4548">suomalainen passi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4549">numero の入力</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4549">passin numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-4550">numero。#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-4550">passin numero.#</span></span>
