#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5452">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5452">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5453">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5453">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5454">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5454">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5455">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5455">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5456">ギリシャの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5456">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5457">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5457">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5458">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5459">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5460">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5460">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5461">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5461">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5462">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5462">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5463">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5464">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5464">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5465">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5466">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5466">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5467">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5467">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5468">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5468">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5469">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5469">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5470">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5470">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5471">正規表現は、  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5471">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5472">From キーワード  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5472">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5501">香港の id カード (HKID) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5501">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5502">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5503">8 ～ 9 桁の文字と数字の組み合わせ、最後の文字はかっこで囲むことも可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5503">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5504">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5505">8 ～ 9 桁の文字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5505">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5506">1 ～ 2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5506">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5507">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5507">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5508">チェック ディジットとして機能する最後の文字 (任意の数字か文字 A) はかっこで囲むことも可能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5508">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5509">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5510">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5510">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5511">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5512">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5513">関数 Func_hong_kong_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5513">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5514">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5514">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5515">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5515">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5516">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5516">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5517">関数 Func_hong_kong_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5517">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5518">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5519">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5519">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hong_kong_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5520">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5520">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5521">hkid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5521">hkid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5522">香港の id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5522">hong kong identity card</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5558">ハンガリードライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5558">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5559">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5560">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5561">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5561">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5562">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5563">2つの文字と6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5563">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5564">2桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5564">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5565">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5565">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5566">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5567">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5567">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5568">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5569">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5570">正規表現は、  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5570">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5571">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5696">ハンガリーの個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5696">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5697">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5697">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5698">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5698">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5699">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5699">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5700">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5700">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5701">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5701">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5702">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5702">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5703">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5704">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5704">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5705">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5706">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5706">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5707">性別に対応する1桁の数字 (1-オス、2-女性、その他の数字は1900または市民が二重市民権を持つ市民の場合もあります)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5707">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5708">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5708">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5709">シリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5709">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5710">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5711">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5712">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5713">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5714">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5715">関数は、  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5716">From キーワード  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5717">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5718">関数は、  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5723">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5723">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5724">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5724">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5725">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5725">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5726">。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5726">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5728">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5728">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5729">ハンガリーのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5729">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5730">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5730">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5731">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5732">2つの文字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない6桁または7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5732">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5733">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5734">2つの文字の後に6桁または7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5734">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5735">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5736">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5736">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5737">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5738">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5738">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5739">正規表現は、  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5739">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5740">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5740">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5741">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5741">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5743">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5743">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5744">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5744">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5745">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5745">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5746">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5746">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5747">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5747">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5749">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5749">passportnumber</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5753">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5753">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5757">ハンガリーの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5757">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5758">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5758">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5759">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5760">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5760">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5761">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5762">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5762">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5763">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5764">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5764">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5765">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5766">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5767">関数は、  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5768">From キーワード  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5768">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5769">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5770">関数は、  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5770">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5790">ハンガリーの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5790">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5791">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5791">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5792">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5792">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5793">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5793">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5794">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5794">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5795">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5795">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5796">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5796">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5797">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5798">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5798">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5799">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5800">10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5800">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5801">"8" である1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5801">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5802">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5802">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5803">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5803">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5804">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5805">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5805">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5806">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5807">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5808">関数は、  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5809">From キーワード  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5809">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5810">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5811">関数は、  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5811">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5822">税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5822">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5826">税務登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5826">tax registration number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5837">ハンガリー値追加税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5837">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5838">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5838">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5839">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5839">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5840">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5840">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5841">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5841">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5842">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5842">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5844">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5845">10文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5845">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5846">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5847">10文字の英数字パターン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5847">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5848">2文字-HU または HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5848">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5849">オプションスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5850">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5850">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5851">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5852">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5853">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5854">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5854">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5855">関数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5856">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5856">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5857">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5857">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5858">関数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5858">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5872">インドの恒久口座番号 (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5872">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5873">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5873">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5874">10 桁の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5874">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5875">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5875">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5876">10 桁の文字または数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5876">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5877">3文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5877">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5878">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (大文字小文字を区別しない) の文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5878">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5879">レター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5879">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5880">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5880">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5881">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5881">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5882">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5883">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5884">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5885">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5886">正規表現 Regex_india_permanent_account_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5887">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5887">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5888">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5888">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5889">正規表現 Regex_india_permanent_account_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5889">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5890">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5890">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5891">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5891">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5892">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5892">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5894">インドの一意識別子 (Aadhaar) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5894">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5895">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5896">省略可能なスペースまたはハイフンを含む 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5896">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5897">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5898">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5898">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5899">0または1以外の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5899">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5900">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5900">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5901">スペースまたはハイフン 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5901">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5902">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5902">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5903">スペースまたはハイフン 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5903">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5904">最後の数字はチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5904">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5905">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5906">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5906">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5907">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5908">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5908">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5909">関数 Func_india_aadhaar は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5909">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5910">Keyword_india_aadhar からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5910">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5911">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5912">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5913">関数 Func_india_aadhaar は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5913">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5914">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5914">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5916">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5916">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5917">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5917">aadhaar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5919">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5919">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5920">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5920">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5921">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5921">आधार</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5923">インドネシアの id カード (KTP) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5923">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5924">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5925">省略可能なピリオドを含む 16 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5925">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5926">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5927">16 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5927">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5928">2 桁の行政区コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5928">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5929">ピリオド 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5930">2 桁の行政区または市コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5930">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5931">2 桁の分区コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5931">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5932">ピリオド 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5932">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5933">DDMMYY の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5933">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5934">ピリオド 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5934">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5935">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5935">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5936">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5937">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5938">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5939">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5940">正規表現 Regex_indonesia_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5940">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5941">Keyword_indonesia_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5941">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5942">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5942">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5943">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5943">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5944">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5944">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5945">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5945">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5946">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5946">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5947">国際銀行口座番号 (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5947">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5948">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5949">国コード (2 文字)、チェックディジット (2 桁)、および番号を bban 最大30文字)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5949">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5950">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5951">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5951">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5952">2文字の国コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5952">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5953">2つのチェックディジット (オプションのスペースが続く)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5953">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5954">1-7 4 つの文字または数字のグループ (スペースで区切ることができます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5954">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5955">1 ～ 3 個の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5955">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5956">各国の形式は少し異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5956">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5957">IBAN 機密情報の種類には、次の60国が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5957">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5958">ad、ae、al、at、az、ba、be、bg、bh、ch、cr、cy、cz、de、dk、do、ee、es、fi、fo、fr、gb、ge、gi、gl、gr、hr、hu、ie、[il]、[it]、[]、[(it)]、[(kz)]、[、li、lt、lu、lv、mc]、[]、[いいえ]、[mr]、[]、[]、[、]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5958">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5959">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5960">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5960">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5961">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5962">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5962">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5963">関数 Func_iban がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5963">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5964">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5964">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5965">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5966">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5966">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5967">Diseases の国際分類 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5967">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5968">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5969">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5969">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5970">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5971">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5971">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5972">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5973">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5973">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5974">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5975">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5975">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5976">Dictionary_icd_10_updated からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5977">Dictionary_icd_10_codes からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5977">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5978">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5979">Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新されたキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5980">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5980">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5981">Dictionary_icd_10_updated キーワードディクショナリからの任意の用語。 [Diseases、10リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-10-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5981">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5982">この型は、保険コードではなく、用語に対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5982">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5983">Dictionary_icd_10_codes キーワードディクショナリからの任意の用語。 [Diseases、10リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-10-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5983">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5984">この型は、説明ではなく、保険コードに対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5984">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5985">Diseases の国際分類 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5985">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5986">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5987">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5987">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5988">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5989">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5989">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5990">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5991">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5992">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5993">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5994">Dictionary_icd_9_updated からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5995">Dictionary_icd_9_codes からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5995">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5996">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5996">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-5997">Dictionary_icd_9_updated からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5997">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-5998">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5998">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-5999">Dictionary_icd_9_updated キーワードディクショナリの任意の用語。 [Diseases、9リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-9-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-5999">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6000">この型は、保険コードではなく、用語に対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6000">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6001">Dictionary_icd_9_codes キーワードディクショナリの任意の用語。 [Diseases、9リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-9-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6001">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6002">この型は、説明ではなく、保険コードに対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6002">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6003">IP アドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6003">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6004">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6004">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6005">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6005">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6006">書式設定あり (ピリオド付き) または書式設定なし (ピリオドなし) のIPv4 アドレスを表す複雑なパターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6006">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6007">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6007">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6008"> 書式設定あり (コロン付き) の IPv6 番号を表す複雑なパターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6008">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6009">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6009">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6010">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6011">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6011">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6012">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6013">IPv6 の場合、DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6013">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6014">正規表現 Regex_ipv6_address がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6015">Keyword_ipaddress のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6015">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6016">IPv4 の場合、DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、95% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6016">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6017">正規表現 Regex_ipv4_address がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6018">Keyword_ipaddress のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6018">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6019">IPv6 の場合、DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、95% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6019">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6020">正規表現 Regex_ipv6_address がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6020">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6021">Keyword_ipaddress のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6021">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6022">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6022">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6023">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6023">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6024">IP (このキーワードでは大文字と小文字が区別されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6024">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6025">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6025">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6026">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6026">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6027">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6027">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6028">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6028">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6029">アイルランドの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6029">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6030">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6030">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6031">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6031">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6032">6桁の数字の後に4文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6032">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6033">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6033">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6034">6桁の数字と4文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6034">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6035">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6035">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6036">4桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6036">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6037">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6038">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6038">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6039">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6040">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6040">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6041">正規表現は、  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6041">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6042">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6042">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6165">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6165">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6166">アイルランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6166">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6167">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6168">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6169">2つの文字または数字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6169">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6170">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6171">2つの文字または数字の後に7桁の数字が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6171">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6172">2 つの数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6172">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6173">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6173">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6174">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6175">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6175">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6176">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6177">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6177">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6178">正規表現は、  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6178">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6179">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6200">アイルランドの個人用パブリックサービス (PPS) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6200">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6201">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6202">古い形式 (2012 年12月31日まで):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6202">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6203">7桁の数字の後に1-2 文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6203">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6204">新しい形式 (1 Jan 2013 以降):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6204">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6205">7桁の数字の後に2つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6205">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6206">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6207">古い形式 (2012 年12月31日まで):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6207">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6208">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6208">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6209">1 ~ 2 文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6209">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6210">新しい形式 (1 Jan 2013 以降):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6210">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6211">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6211">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6212">アルファベットのチェックディジットである文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6212">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6213">A ~ I の範囲のオプションの文字、または "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6213">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6214">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6215">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6216">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6217">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6218">関数 Func_ireland_pps は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6218">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6219">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6219">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6220">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6221">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6222">関数 Func_ireland_pps は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6222">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6223">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
