## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6268">イスラエルの銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6268">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6269">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6269">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6270">13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6270">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6271">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6271">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6272">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6272">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6273">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6273">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6274">ダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6274">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6275">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6275">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6276">ダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6277">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6277">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6278">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6278">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6279">	13 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6279">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6280">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6281">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6281">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6282">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6283">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6283">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6284">正規表現 Regex_israel_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6284">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6285">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6285">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6286">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6286">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6288">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6288">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6289">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6289">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6290">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6290">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6291">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6291">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6292">イスラエルの国民識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6292">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6293">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6294">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6294">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6295">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6296">9桁の連続した数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6296">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6297">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6298">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6298">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6299">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6300">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6300">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6301">関数 Func_israeli_national_id_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6301">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6302">Keyword_Israel_National_ID のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6302">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6303">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6309">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6309">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6310">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6310">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6311">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6311">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6312">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6312">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6313">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6313">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6314">idnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6314">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6315">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6315">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6316">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6316">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6317">id 番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6317">identitynumber#</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6321">一意の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6321">unique id</span></span>  

   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6322">イタリアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6322">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6323">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6323">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6324">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6325">10個の文字と数字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6325">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6326">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6327">10個の文字と数字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6328">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6328">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6329">文字 "A" または "V" (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6329">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6330">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6330">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6331">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6331">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6332">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6333">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6333">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6334">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6335">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6336">正規表現 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6336">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6337">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6337">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6338">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6338">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6339">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6339">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6340">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6340">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6341">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6341">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6342">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6342">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6343">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6343">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6344">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6344">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6345">イタリアの会計年度コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6345">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6346">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6346">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6347">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6347">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6348">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6348">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6349">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6349">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6350">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6350">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6351">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6351">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6352">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6353">指定したパターンの文字と数字の16文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6353">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6354">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6355">文字と数字の16文字の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6355">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6356">ファミリ名の最初の3つの子音に対応する3つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6356">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6357">最初の名前の最初、3番目、および4番目の子音に対応する3つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6357">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6358">誕生年の最後の桁に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6358">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6359">誕生日の文字に対応する1つの文字-文字はアルファベット順に使用されますが、A から E、H、L、M、P、R から T までの文字が使用されます (つまり、1月は A と10月は R)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6359">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6360">genders を区別するために、誕生日に対応する2桁の数字は、女性の誕生日に40が追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6360">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6361">個人が生まれた municipality に固有のエリアコードに対応する4桁の数字 (国全体のコードは外国で使用されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6361">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6362">1つのパリティ付き数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6362">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6363">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6364">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6364">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6365">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6366">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6367">関数は、  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6367">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6368">From キーワード  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6368">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6369">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6370">関数は、  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6370">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6405">イタリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6405">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6406">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6407">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6408">2つの文字または数字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6408">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6409">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6410">2つの文字または数字の後に7桁の数字が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6410">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6411">2桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6411">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6412">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6412">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6413">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6414">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6414">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6415">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6416">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6417">正規表現は、  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6417">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6418">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6439">イタリアの付加価値税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6439">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6440">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6441">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6442">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6443">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6444">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6445">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6446">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6447">13文字の英数字パターン (オプションの区切り記号付き)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6447">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6448">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6449">13文字の英数字パターンで、省略可能な区切り記号を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6449">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6450">I または i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6450">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6451">T または t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6451">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6452">オプションの space、ドット、ハイフン、またはコンマ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6452">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6453">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6453">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6454">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6455">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6456">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6457">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6458">関数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6458">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6459">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6459">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6460">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6460">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6461">関数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6461">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6469">日本の銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6469">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6470">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6471">7桁または8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6471">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6472">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6473">銀行口座番号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6473">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6474">7桁または8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6474">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6475">銀行口座の支店コード:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6475">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6476">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6476">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6477">スペースまたはダッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6477">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6478">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6478">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6479">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6480">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6481">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6482">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6483">関数 Func_jp_bank_account がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6483">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6484">Keyword_jp_bank_account のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6484">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6485">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6485">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6486">関数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6486">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6487">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6487">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6488">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6489">関数 Func_jp_bank_account がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6489">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6490">Keyword_jp_bank_account のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6490">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6537">日本の運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6537">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6538">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6539">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6539">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6540">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6541">12 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6541">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6542">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6543">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6544">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6545">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6545">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6546">関数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6546">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6547">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6547">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6585">日本の電話番号-会社</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6585">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6586">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6586">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6587">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6587">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6588">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6588">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6589">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6589">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6590">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6590">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6591">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6591">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6592">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6593">13桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6593">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6594">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6595">13桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6595">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6596">1 ~ 9 の1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6596">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6597">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6597">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6598">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6599">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6599">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6600">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6601">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6601">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6602">関数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6602">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6603">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6603">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6604">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6605">関数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6605">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6606">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6606">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6607">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6607">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6608">会社番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6608">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6609">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6609">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6610">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6610">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6611">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6611">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6612">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6612">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6613">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6613">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6614">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6614">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6615">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6615">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6616">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6616">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6617">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6617">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6618">日本の自宅番号-個人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6618">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6619">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6619">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6620">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6620">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6621">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6621">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6622">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6622">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6623">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6623">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6624">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6624">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6625">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6626">12桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6626">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6627">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6628">12桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6628">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6629">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6629">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6630">スペース、ドット、またはハイフン (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6630">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6631">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6631">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6632">スペース、ドット、またはハイフン (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6632">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6633">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6633">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6634">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6635">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6635">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6636">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6637">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6638">関数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6638">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6639">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6639">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6640">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6640">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6641">関数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6641">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6642">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6642">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6643">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6643">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6644">自分の番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6644">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6645">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6645">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6646">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6646">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6647">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6647">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6648">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6648">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6649">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6649">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6650">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6650">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6651">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6651">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6652">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6652">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6653">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6653">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6654">日本のパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6654">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6655">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6656">2文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6656">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6657">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6658">2文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6658">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6659">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6660">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6661">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6662">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6662">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6663">関数 Func_jp_passport がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6663">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6664">Keyword_jp_passport のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6665">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6665">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6666">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6666">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6667">サインアウト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6667">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6668">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6668">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6669">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6669">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6670">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6670">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6671">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6671">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6672">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6672">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6673">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6673">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6674">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6674">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6675">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6675">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6676">パスポートNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6676">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6677">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6677">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6678">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6678">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6679">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6679">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6680">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6680">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6681">居住地のカード番号 (日本)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6681">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6682">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6683">12桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6683">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6684">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6685">12桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6685">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6686">2文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6686">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6687">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6687">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6688">2文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6688">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6689">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6690">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6690">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6691">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6692">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6693">正規表現 Regex_jp_residence_card_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6693">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6694">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6695">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6695">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6696">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6696">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6703">日本の居住登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6703">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6704">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6705">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6705">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6706">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6707">11 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6707">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6708">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6709">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6709">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6710">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6711">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6712">関数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6712">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6713">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6713">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6718">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6718">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6719">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6719">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6720">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6720">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6721">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6721">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6722">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6722">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6723">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6723">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6724">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6724">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6725">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6725">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6726">日本の社会保険番号 (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6726">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6727">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6728">7～ 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6728">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6729">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6730">7 ～ 12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6730">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6731">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6731">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6732">ハイフン1つ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6733">6桁の数字または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6733">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6734">7 ～ 12 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6734">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6735">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6736">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6736">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6737">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6738">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6739">関数 Func_jp_sin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6739">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6740">Keyword_jp_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6740">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6741">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6741">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6742">関数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6742">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6743">Keyword_jp_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6743">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6764">ラトビアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6764">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6765">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6766">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6767">3つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6767">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6768">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6769">3つの文字と6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6769">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6770">3桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6770">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6771">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6771">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6772">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6773">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6773">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6774">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6775">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6776">正規表現は、  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6776">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6777">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6777">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6799">ドライバー lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6799">drivers lics</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6902">ラトビアの個人コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6902">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6903">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6904">11桁の数字と任意指定のハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6904">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6905">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6906">古い形式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6906">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6907">11桁の数字とハイフン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6907">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6908">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6908">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6909">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6909">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6910">誕生日の世紀に対応する1桁の数字 (「0」、20世紀の場合は「1」、21世紀の場合は「2」)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6910">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6911">ランダムに生成される4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6911">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6912">新しい形式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6912">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6913">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6913">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6914">2桁の "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6914">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6915">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6915">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6916">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6917">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6917">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6918">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6919">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6920">関数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` または regex が `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6920">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6921">From キーワード  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6921">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6922">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6923">関数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` または regex が `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6923">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6986">ラトビアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6986">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6987">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6987">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6988">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6989">2つの文字または数字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6989">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6990">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6991">2つの文字または数字の後に7桁の数字が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6991">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6992">2桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6992">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6993">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6993">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6994">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6995">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-6996">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-6997">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6997">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6998">正規表現は、  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6998">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-6999">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-6999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7019">リトアニア運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7019">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7020">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7020">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7021">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7022">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7022">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7023">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7024">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7024">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7025">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7026">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7027">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7028">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7028">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7029">正規表現は、  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7029">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7030">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7031">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7031">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7032">Keywords_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7032">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7033">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7033">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7034">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7034">driverlics</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7162">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7162">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7163">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7163">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7164">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7164">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7165">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7165">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7166">ユーザーの性別および誕生世紀に対応する1桁の数字 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7166">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7167">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7167">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7168">誕生日のシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7168">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7169">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7169">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7170">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7171">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7171">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7172">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7173">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7173">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7174">関数は、  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7174">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7175">From キーワード  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7175">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7176">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7177">関数は、  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7177">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
