## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7212">リトアニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7212">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7213">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7213">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7214">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7215">8桁の数字または文字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7215">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7216">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7217">8桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7217">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7218">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7219">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7219">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7220">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7221">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7222">正規表現は、  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7222">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7223">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7223">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7240">ルクセンブルグドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7240">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7241">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7241">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7242">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7243">スペースと区切り文字を含まない6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7243">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7244">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7245">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7245">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7246">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7247">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7248">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7249">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7250">正規表現は、  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7250">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7251">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7251">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7375">ルクセンブルク national 識別番号 (自然人数)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7375">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7376">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7377">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7378">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7379">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7380">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7381">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7382">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7383">13桁の数字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7383">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7384">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7385">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7385">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7386">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7386">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7387">2つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7387">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7388">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7388">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7389">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7389">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7390">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7390">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7391">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7391">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7392">関数は、  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7392">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7393">From キーワード  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7393">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7394">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7394">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7395">関数は、  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7395">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7418">ルクセンブルグパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7418">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7419">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7419">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7420">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7421">8桁の数字または文字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7421">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7422">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7423">8桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7423">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7424">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7425">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7426">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7427">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7428">正規表現は、  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7428">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7429">From キーワード  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7429">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7430">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7430">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7431">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7431">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7432">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7432">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7433">ラトビアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7433">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7434">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7434">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7435">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7435">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7436">ルクセンブルク national 識別番号 (非自然人数)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7436">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7437">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7438">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7438">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7439">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7440">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7440">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7441">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7442">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7442">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7443">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7443">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7444">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7445">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7446">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7446">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7447">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7447">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7448">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7448">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7449">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7450">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7450">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7451">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7452">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7452">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7453">関数は、  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7453">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7454">From キーワード  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7454">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7455">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7456">関数は、  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7456">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7496">マレーシアの識別カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7496">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7497">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7498">省略可能なハイフンを含む 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7498">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7499">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7500">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7500">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7501">YYMMDD というの日付の形式の6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7501">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7502">ダッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7502">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7503">2文字の出生地コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7503">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7504">ダッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7504">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7505">3桁のランダムな数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7505">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7506">1桁の性別コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7506">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7507">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7508">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7508">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7509">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7510">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7510">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7511">正規表現 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7511">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7512">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7512">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7539">マルタ運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7539">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7540">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7540">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7541">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7541">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7542">指定したパターンの2つの文字と6桁の数字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7542">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7543">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7544">2つの文字と6桁の数字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7544">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7545">2つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない数字または文字)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7545">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7546">スペース (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7546">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7547">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7547">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7548">スペース (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7548">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7549">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7549">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7550">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7550">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7551">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7551">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7552">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7552">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7553">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7553">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7554">正規表現は、  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7554">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7555">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7555">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7679">マルタの id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7679">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7680">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7680">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7681">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7681">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7682">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7682">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7683">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7683">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7684">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7684">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7685">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7685">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7686">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7687">7桁の数字の後に1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7687">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7688">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7689">7桁の数字の後に1文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7689">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7690">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7691">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (大文字小文字の区別なし) の1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7691">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7692">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7693">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7693">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7694">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7695">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7696">正規表現は、  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7696">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7697">From キーワード  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7697">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7698">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7698">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7699">正規表現は、  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7699">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7704">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7704">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7705">kodiċi numerali パーソナル i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7705">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7707">numru ta ' identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7707">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7708">numru ta ' identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7708">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7709">numru ta ' 識別子 tuniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7709">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7710">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7710">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7711">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7711">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7712">個人の数値コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7712">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7713">一意の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7713">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7714">一意の id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7714">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7716">マルタのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7716">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7717">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7717">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7718">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7719">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7719">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7720">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7721">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7721">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7722">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7723">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7724">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7725">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7726">正規表現は、  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7726">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7727">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7744">マルタ税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7744">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7745">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7746">マルタ nationals の場合:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7746">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7747">指定したパターンの7桁の数字と1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7747">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7748">非マルタ nationals およびマルタエンティティ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7748">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7749">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7749">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7750">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7751">マルタ nationals: 7 桁の数字と1つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7751">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7752">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7753">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7753">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7754">非マルタ nationals およびマルタエンティティ: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7754">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7755">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7755">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7756">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7757">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7757">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7758">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7759">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7759">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7760">Regex を  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  検索するか、 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7760">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7761">From キーワード  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7761">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7762">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7762">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7763">Regex を  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 検索するか、 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7763">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7796">オランダの市民サービス (BSN) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7796">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7797">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7798">省略可能なスペースを含む8つの9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7798">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7799">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7800">8 ~ 9 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7800">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7801">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7801">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7802">スペース (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7802">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7803">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7803">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7804">スペース (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7804">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7805">2 ~ 3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7805">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7806">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7807">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7808">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7809">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7810">関数 Func_netherlands_bsn は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7810">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7811">Keyword_netherlands_bsn からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7811">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7812">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7828">社会会計番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7828">social-fiscal number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7834">一意の id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7834">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7836">オランダドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7836">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7837">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7837">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7838">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7839">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7839">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7840">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7841">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7841">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7842">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7843">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7843">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7844">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7845">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7846">正規表現は、  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7846">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7847">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7847">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7975">オランダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7975">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7976">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7976">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7977">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7978">9文字または数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7978">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7979">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7980">9桁の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7980">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7981">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7981">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7982">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7982">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7983">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7983">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7984">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7985">正規表現は、  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7985">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7986">From キーワード  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7986">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7987">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7987">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7988">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7988">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7989">オランダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7989">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7990">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7990">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7991">オランダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7991">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7992">nederlanden の nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7992">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7993">大き poort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7993">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7994">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7994">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7995">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7995">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-7996">オランダの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7996">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-7997">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7997">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7998">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7998">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-7999">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-7999">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8000">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8000">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8001">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8001">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8002">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8002">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8003">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8004">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8004">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8005">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8006">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8006">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8007">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8008">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8008">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8009">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8010">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8010">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8011">関数は、  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8011">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8012">From キーワード  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8012">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8013">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8013">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8014">関数は、  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8014">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8052">オランダ値追加税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8052">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8053">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8054">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8055">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8056">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8057">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8058">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8059">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8060">14文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8060">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8061">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8062">14文字の英数字パターン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8062">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8063">N または n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8063">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8064">L または l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8064">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8065">スペース、ドット、またはハイフン (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8065">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8066">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8066">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8067">スペース、ドット、またはハイフン (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8067">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8068">B または b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8068">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8069">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8069">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8070">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8071">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8071">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8072">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8073">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8073">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8074">関数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8074">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8075">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8075">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8076">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8077">関数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8077">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8082">過誤#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8082">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8083">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8083">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8086">ニュージーランド銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8086">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8087">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8087">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8088">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8088">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8089">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8089">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8090">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8090">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8091">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8091">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8092">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8092">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8093">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8094">14から16桁の数字のパターン (オプションの区切り記号付き)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8094">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8095">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8096">14桁から16桁の数字のパターン。省略可能な区切り文字を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8096">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8097">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8097">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8098">省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8098">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8099">3桁から4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8099">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8100">省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8100">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8101">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8101">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8102">省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8102">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8103">2 ~ 3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8103">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8104">オプションのハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8104">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8105">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8106">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8107">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8108">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8109">関数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8109">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8110">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8110">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8111">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8112">関数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8112">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8114">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8114">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8120">ニュージーランド運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8120">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8121">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8121">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8122">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8122">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8123">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8123">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8124">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8124">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8125">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8125">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8126">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8126">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8127">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8128">8文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8128">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8129">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8130">8文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8130">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8131">2文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8131">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8132">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8132">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8133">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8134">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8135">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8136">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8136">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8137">関数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8137">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8138">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8138">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8139">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8139">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8140">関数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8140">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8207">ニュージーランド inland 歳入番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8207">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8208">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8208">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8209">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8209">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8210">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8210">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8211">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8211">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8212">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8212">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8214">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8215">省略可能な区切り記号を持つ8または9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8215">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8216">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8217">省略可能な区切り記号を持つ8または9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8217">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8218">2桁または3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8218">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8219">オプションのスペースまたはハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8219">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8220">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8220">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8221">オプションのスペースまたはハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8221">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8222">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8222">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8223">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8224">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8224">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8225">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8226">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8226">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8227">関数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8227">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8228">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8228">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8229">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8230">関数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8230">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8231">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8231">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8233">ird no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8233">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8234">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8234">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8235">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8235">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8236">ニュージーランド ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8236">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8237">ird 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8237">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8238">inland 歳入番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8238">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8239">ニュージーランドの衛生官庁番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8239">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8240">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8241">3文字、スペース (省略可能)、4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8241">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8242">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8243">' I ' と ' O ' 以外の3文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8243">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8244">スペース (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8244">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8245">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8245">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8246">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8247">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8248">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8249">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8250">関数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8250">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8251">Keyword_nz_terms のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8251">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8252">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8253">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8254">関数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8254">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8255">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8256">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8256">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8261">処理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8261">treatment</span></span>
