- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8263">nhi 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8263">nhi number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8264">nhi no。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8264">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8265">NHI#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8265">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8266">国内正常性インデックス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8266">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8267">国内正常性インデックス Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8267">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8268">国内正常性インデックス#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8268">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8269">ニュージーランドソーシャル wlefare 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8269">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8270">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8271">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8272">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8272">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8273">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8273">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8274">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8275">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8276">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8277">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8277">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8278">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8279">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8279">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8280">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8280">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8281">任意指定のハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8281">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8282">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8282">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8283">任意指定のハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8283">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8284">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8284">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8285">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8286">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8287">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8288">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8289">関数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8289">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8290">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8290">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8291">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8291">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8292">関数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8292">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8293">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8293">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8294">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8294">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8295">social welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8295">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8296">social welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8296">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8297">social welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8297">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8298">ソーシャル welfare 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8298">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8299">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8299">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8300">ノルウェーの識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8300">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8301">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8302">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8302">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8303">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8304">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8304">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8305">DDMMYY という形式の誕生日を示す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8305">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8306">3桁の個別の番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8306">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8307">2つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8307">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8308">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8309">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8310">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8311">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8311">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8312">関数 Func_norway_id_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8312">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8313">Keyword_norway_id_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8313">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8314">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8314">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8315">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8315">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8316">関数 Func_norway_id_numbe は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8316">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8317">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8317">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8326">フィリピン統合多重目的識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8326">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8327">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8328">ハイフンで区切られた 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8328">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8329">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8330">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8330">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8331">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8331">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8332">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8332">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8333">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8333">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8334">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8334">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8335">1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8335">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8336">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8337">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8337">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8338">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8339">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8340">正規表現 Regex_philippines_unified_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8340">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8341">Keyword_philippines_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8341">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8342">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8342">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8343">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8343">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8344">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8344">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8345">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8345">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8346">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8346">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8347">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8347">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8348">ポーランドの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8348">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8349">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8350">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8351">2つのスラッシュを含む14桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8351">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8352">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8353">14桁の数字と2つのスラッシュ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8353">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8354">5桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8354">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8355">スラッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8355">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8356">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8356">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8357">スラッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8357">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8358">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8358">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8359">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8360">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8361">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8362">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8363">正規表現は、  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8363">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8364">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8364">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8386">ドライバー lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8386">drivers lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8387">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8387">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8488">ポーランドの id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8488">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8489">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8490">3桁の文字と6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8490">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8491">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8491">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8492">3文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8492">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8493">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8494">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8494">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8495">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8496">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8496">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8497">関数 Func_polish_national_id がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8497">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8498">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8498">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8499">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8500">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8500">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8503">特定 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8503">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8504">Nazwa i 特定 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8504">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8505">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8505">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8510">ポーランドの国民 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8510">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8511">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8512">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8512">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8513">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8513">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8514">YYMMDD というの形式で生年月日を表す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8514">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8515">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8515">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8516">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8516">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8517">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8518">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8519">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8520">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8520">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8521">関数 Func_pesel_identification_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8521">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8522">Keyword_pesel_identification_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8522">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8523">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8524">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8524">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8525">関数 Func_pesel_identification_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8525">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8526">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8527">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8527">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8528">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8528">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8529">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8529">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8530">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8530">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8531">niepowtarzalny 特定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8531">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8532">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8532">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8533">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8533">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8534">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8534">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8535">特定 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8535">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8536">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8536">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8537">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8537">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8538">ポーランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8538">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8539">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8540">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8541">2つの文字と7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8541">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8542">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8543">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8543">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8544">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8545">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8546">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8547">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8547">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8548">関数 Func_polish_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8548">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8549">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8549">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8550">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8550">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8551">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8551">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8552">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8552">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8553">特定の引数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8553">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8554">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8554">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8555">大き zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8555">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8556">があります</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8556">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8557">ポーランドの番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8557">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8558">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8558">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8559">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8559">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8560">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8560">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8561">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8561">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8562">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8562">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8563">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8563">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8564">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8565">9桁の数字または14桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8565">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8566">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8567">9桁の数字または14桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8567">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8568">9桁の数字または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8568">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8569">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8569">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8570">ハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8570">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8571">5桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8571">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8572">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8573">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8574">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8575">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8576">関数 Func_polish_regon_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8576">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8577">Keywords_polish_regon_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8577">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8578">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8578">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8579">関数 Func_polish_regon_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8579">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8580">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8580">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8581">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8581">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8582">id に対する reg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8582">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8583">統計番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8583">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8584">統計 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8584">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8585">統計番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8585">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8586">regon 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8586">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8587">regonid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8587">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8588">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8588">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8589">会社 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8589">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8590">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8590">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8591">会社 id (いいえ)#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8591">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8592">特定 statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8592">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8593">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8593">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8594">numerstatystyczny#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8594">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8595">numeruregon#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8595">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8596">ポーランドの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8596">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8597">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8597">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8598">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8598">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8599">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8599">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8600">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8600">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8601">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8601">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8602">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8602">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8603">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8604">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8604">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8605">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8606">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8606">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8607">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8608">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8608">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8609">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8610">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8611">関数は、  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8611">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8612">From キーワード  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8612">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8642">ポルトガルの市民カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8642">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8643">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8644">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8644">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8645">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8646">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8646">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8647">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8648">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8648">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8649">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8650">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8650">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8651">正規表現 Regex_portugal_citizen_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8651">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8652">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8652">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8672">ポルトガルドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8672">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8673">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8673">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8674">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8675">2つのパターン-2 文字の後に特殊文字の5-8 数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8675">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8676">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8677">パターン 1: 2 文字の後に、特殊文字を含む5/6 が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8677">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8678">2桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8678">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8679">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8679">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8680">5桁または6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8680">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8681">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8681">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8682">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8682">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8683">パターン 2: 1 文字の後に、特殊文字を6/8 数字の後に続けます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8683">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8684">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8684">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8685">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8685">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8686">6桁または8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8686">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8687">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8687">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8688">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8688">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8689">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8690">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8690">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8691">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8692">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8693">正規表現は、  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8693">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8694">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8694">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8826">ポルトガルのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8826">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8827">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8827">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8828">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8829">1文字の後に6桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号を付けない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8829">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8830">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8831">1文字の後に6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8831">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8832">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8832">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8833">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8833">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8834">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8835">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8835">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8836">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8837">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8837">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8838">正規表現は、  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8838">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8839">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8839">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8863">ポルトガルの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8863">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8864">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8865">省略可能なスペースを含む9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8865">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8866">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8867">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8867">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8868">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8868">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8869">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8869">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8870">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8870">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8871">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8871">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8872">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8873">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8874">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8875">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8876">関数は、  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8876">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8877">From キーワード  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8878">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8878">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8879">関数は、  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8879">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8904">ルーマニアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8904">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8905">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8906">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8907">1文字の後に8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8907">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8908">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8909">1文字の後に8桁の数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8909">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8910">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8910">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8911">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8911">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8912">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8913">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8913">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-8914">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-8915">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8915">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8916">正規表現は、  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8916">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-8917">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-8917">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9045">ルーマニアの個人数値コード (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9045">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9046">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9047">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9048">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9049">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9050">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9051">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9052">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9053">13桁の数字 (スペースと区切り文字なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9053">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9054">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9055">1-9 から1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9055">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9056">誕生日を表す6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9056">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9057">01-52 または99の2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9057">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9058">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9058">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9059">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9060">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9060">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9061">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9062">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9063">関数は、  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9063">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9064">From キーワード  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9064">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9065">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9066">関数は、  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9066">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9117">ルーマニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9117">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9118">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9118">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9119">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9119">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9120">スペースと区切り文字を除いた8桁または9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9120">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9121">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9121">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9122">8桁または9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9122">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9123">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9123">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9124">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9124">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9125">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9125">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9126">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9126">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9127">正規表現は、  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9127">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9128">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9131">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9131">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9132">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9132">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9133">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9133">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9134">passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9134">passports</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9142">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9142">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9143">ロシアのパスポート番号 (国内)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9143">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9144">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9144">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9145">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9145">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9146">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9146">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9147">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9147">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9148">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9148">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9149">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9149">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9150">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9151">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9151">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9152">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9153">10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9153">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9154">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9155">オプションのスペースまたはハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9155">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9156">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9156">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9157">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9157">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9158">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9158">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9159">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9160">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9161">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9162">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9163">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9163">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9164">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9164">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9181">ロシアのパスポート番号国際</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9181">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9182">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9182">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9183">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9183">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9184">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9184">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9185">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9185">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9186">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9186">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9187">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9187">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9188">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9189">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9189">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9190">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9191">9桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9191">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9192">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9192">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9193">オプションのスペースまたはハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9193">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9194">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9194">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9195">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9196">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9196">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9197">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9198">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9199">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9199">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9200">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9200">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9217">サウジアラビアの国民 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9217">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9218">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9219">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9219">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9220">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9221">10桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9221">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9222">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9223">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9223">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9224">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9225">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9226">正規表現 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9226">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9227">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9227">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9232">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9232">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9233">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9233">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9234">シンガポールの米国登録 id カード (NRIC) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9234">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9235">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9236">9桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9236">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9237">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9237">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9238">9桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9238">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9239">文字 "F"、"G"、"S"、または "T" (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9239">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9240">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9240">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9241">アルファベットのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9241">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9242">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9243">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9243">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9244">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9245">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9245">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9246">正規表現 Regex_singapore_nric は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9246">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9247">Keyword_singapore_nric からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9247">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9248">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9248">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9249">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9250">正規表現 Regex_singapore_nric は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9250">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9251">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9251">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
