## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9262">スロバキアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9262">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9263">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9263">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9264">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9265">1文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9265">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9266">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9267">1文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9267">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9268">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9268">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9269">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9269">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9270">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9271">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9271">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9272">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9273">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9274">正規表現は、  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9274">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9275">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9275">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9401">スロバキアの個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9401">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9402">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9402">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9403">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9403">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9404">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9404">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9405">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9405">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9406">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9406">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9407">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9407">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9408">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9409">省略可能な円記号を含む9桁または10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9409">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9410">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9410">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9411">誕生日を表す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9411">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9412">省略可能なスラッシュ (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9412">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9413">3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9413">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9414">1つのオプションのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9414">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9415">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9416">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9417">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9418">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9419">関数は、  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9419">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9420">From キーワード  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9420">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9421">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9421">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9422">関数は、  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9422">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9469">スロバキアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9469">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9470">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9470">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9471">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9472">1つの数字または文字の後に7桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9472">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9473">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9474">1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9474">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9475">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9476">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9477">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9478">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9478">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9479">正規表現は、  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9479">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9480">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9480">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9499">スロベニアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9499">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9500">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9500">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9501">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9502">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9502">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9503">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9503">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9504">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9504">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9505">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9506">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9506">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9507">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9508">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9508">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9509">正規表現は、  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9509">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9510">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9510">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9637">スロベニア固有マスタ市民番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9637">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9638">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9639">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9640">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9641">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9642">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9643">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9644">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9645">13桁の数字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9645">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9646">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9647">指定したパターンの13桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9647">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9648">誕生日 (DDMMLLL) に対応する7桁の数字で、"LLL" は誕生年の最後の3桁に対応します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9648">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9649">"50" という誕生日の領域に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9649">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9650">同じ日に生まれた人物の性別とシリアル番号の組み合わせに対応する3つの数字 (女性の場合は男性と500-999 は 000-499)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9650">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9651">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9651">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9652">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9653">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9653">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9654">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9655">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9656">関数は、  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9656">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9657">From キーワード  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9657">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9658">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9659">関数は、  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9659">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9687">スロベニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9687">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9688">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9689">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9690">2つの文字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9690">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9691">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9692">2つの文字の後に7桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9692">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9693">文字 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9693">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9694">1文字の大文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9694">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9695">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9695">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9696">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9697">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9697">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9698">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9699">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9700">正規表現は、  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9700">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9701">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9701">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9715">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9715">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9721">スロベニアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9721">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9722">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9722">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9723">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9723">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9724">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9724">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9725">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9725">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9726">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9726">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9727">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9727">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9728">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9729">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9729">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9730">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9730">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9731">1-9 の1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9731">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9732">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9732">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9733">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9733">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9734">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9735">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9736">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9737">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9738">関数は、  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9738">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9739">From キーワード  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9739">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9740">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9740">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9741">関数は、  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9741">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9765">南アフリカの識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9765">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9766">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9767">省略可能なスペースを含む 13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9767">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9768">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9769">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9769">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9770">YYMMDD というの日付の形式の6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9770">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9771">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9771">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9772">1桁の市民権インジケーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9772">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9773">数字の「8」または「9」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9773">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9774">チェックサムの1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9774">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9775">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9776">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9777">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9778">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9778">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9779">関数 Func_south_africa_identification_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9779">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9780">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9780">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9781">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9782">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9782">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9783">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9783">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9784">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9784">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9785">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9785">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9786">Fim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9786">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9787">南韓国の常駐登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9787">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9788">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9789">ハイフンを 1 つ含む 13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9789">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9790">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9791">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9791">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9792">YYMMDD というの日付の形式の6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9792">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9793">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9793">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9794">世紀と性別によって決定される1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9794">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9795">4桁の生年月日コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9795">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9796">前の番号が同一であるユーザーを区別するために使用される1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9796">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9797">チェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9797">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9798">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9799">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9800">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9801">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9802">関数 Func_south_korea_resident_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9802">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9803">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9803">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9804">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9804">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9805">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9805">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9806">関数 Func_south_korea_resident_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9806">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9807">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9807">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9808">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9808">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9809">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9809">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9810">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9810">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9811">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9811">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9812">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9812">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9813">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9813">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9814">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9814">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9815">スペインの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9815">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9816">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9817">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9818">8桁の数字の後に1つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9818">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9819">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9820">8桁の数字の後に1文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9820">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9821">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9821">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9822">1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9822">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9823">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9824">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9824">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9825">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9826">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9826">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9827">関数を  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 返し `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` ます。または、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9827">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9828">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9828">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9829">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9829">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9830">関数を  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 返し `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` ます。または、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9830">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9964">スペイン DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9964">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9965">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9966">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9967">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9968">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9969">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9970">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9971">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9972">8桁の数字の後に1つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9972">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9973">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9974">7桁の数字の後に1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9974">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9975">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9975">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9976">オプションのスペースまたはハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9976">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9977">1つのチェック文字 (大文字と小文字は区別されません)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9977">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9978">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9979">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9979">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-9980">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9981">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9981">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9982">関数を  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 返し `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` ます。または、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9982">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9983">From キーワード  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-9984">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-9985">関数を  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 返し `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` ます。または、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-9985">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10009">スペインのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10009">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10010">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10010">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10011">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10012">スペースまたは区切り記号を含まない、文字と数字の8文字または9文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10012">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10013">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10014">文字と数字の8文字または9文字の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10014">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10015">2桁の数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10015">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10016">1桁の数字または文字 (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10016">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10017">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10017">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10018">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10019">該当なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10019">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10020">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10021">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10021">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10022">正規表現は、  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10022">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10023">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10026">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10026">passport#</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10036">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10036">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10041">número de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10041">número de pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10042">números pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10042">números pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10043">pasaporte no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10043">pasaporte no</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10049">スペインの社会保障番号 (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10049">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10050">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID 機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10050">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10051">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10052">11 ～ 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10052">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10053">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10054">11-12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10054">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10055">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10055">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10056">スラッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10056">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10057">7桁から8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10057">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10058">スラッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10058">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10059">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10059">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10060">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10061">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10062">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10063">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10063">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10064">関数 Func_spanish_social_security_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10064">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10065">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10066">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10066">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10067">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10067">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10068">スペインの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10068">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10069">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10069">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10070">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10070">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10071">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10071">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10072">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10072">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10073">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10073">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10074">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10074">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10075">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10075">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10076">7桁または8桁の数字と、指定したパターンの1文字または2文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10076">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10077">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10077">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10078">スペインの国民 Id カードを持つスペインの自然の人物:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10078">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10079">8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10079">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10080">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10081">スペインの国民 Id カードを持たない非常駐 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10081">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10082">1つの大文字の "L" (大文字と小文字を区別する)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10082">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10083">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10083">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10084">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10085">Spaniards は、次のようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10085">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10086">1つの大文字の "K" (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10086">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10087">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10087">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10088">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10089">Foreigner の Id 番号を持つ Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10089">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10090">"X"、"Y"、または "Z" (大文字と小文字を区別) の1つの大文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10090">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10091">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10091">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10092">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10092">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10093">Foreigner の識別番号のない Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10093">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10094">1つの大文字の "M" (大文字と小文字を区別する)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10094">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10095">7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10095">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10096">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10096">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10097">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10098">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10098">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10099">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10100">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10100">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10101">関数を  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 返し `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ます。または、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10101">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10102">From キーワード  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10102">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10103">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10103">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10104">関数を  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 返し `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ます。または、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10104">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10135">SQL Server の接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10135">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10136">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10136">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10137">文字列 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"、または "UserId" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10137">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10138">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10138">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10139">文字列 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"、または "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10139">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10140">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10140">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10141">文字列 "Password" または "pwd" ("pwd" の前に小文字が含まれていません)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10141">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10142">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10142">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10143">ドル記号 ($)、パーセント記号 (%)、不等号 (>)、記号 (@)、二重引用符 (")、セミコロン (;)、左中かっこ ([)、左かっこ ({) のいずれでもない文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10143">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10144">セミコロンではない7-128 文字の任意の組み合わせ (;)、スラッシュ (/)、または引用符 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10144">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10145">セミコロン (;)または二重引用符 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10145">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10146">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10147">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10148">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10149">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10150">正規表現 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10150">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10151">CEP_GlobalFilter からのキーワードが見つかり **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10151">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10152">正規表現 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10152">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10153">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し **ません** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10153">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10154">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10154">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10155">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10155">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10156">パスワードの一部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10156">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10157">パスワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10157">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10158">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10158">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10159">示す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10159">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10160">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10160">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10161">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10161">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10162">Password または pwd の後に、0-2 スペース、等号 (=)、0-2 スペース、アスタリスク (\*)、または--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10162">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10163">Password または pwd の後に、次のように入力します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10163">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10164">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10164">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10165">不等号 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10165">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10166">1-200 文字の大文字と小文字、数字、アスタリスク (\*)、ハイフン (-)、下線 (_)、または空白文字の任意の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10166">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10167">不等号 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10167">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10168">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10168">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10169">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10169">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10170">拠点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10170">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10171">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10171">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10172">ノース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10172">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10173">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10173">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10174">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10174">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10175">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10175">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10176">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10176">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10177">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10177">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10178">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10178">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10179">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10179">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10180">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10180">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10181">スウェーデンの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10181">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10182">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10183">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10184">10桁の数字 (ハイフンを含む)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10184">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10185">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10186">ハイフンを含む10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10186">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10187">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10187">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10188">ハイフン1つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10188">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10189">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10189">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10190">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10191">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10191">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10192">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10193">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10194">正規表現は、  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10194">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10195">またはのキーワードが  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10195">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10328">スウェーデンの国民 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10328">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10329">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10330">10桁または12桁の数字とオプションの区切り記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10330">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10331">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10332">10桁または12桁の数字とオプションの区切り記号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10332">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10333">2桁の数字 (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10333">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10334">YYMMDD という日付形式の 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10334">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10335">"-" または "+" の区切り記号 (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10335">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10336">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10336">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10337">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10338">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10338">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10339">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10340">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10340">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10341">関数は、 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10341">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10342">From キーワード `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` が見つかりました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10342">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10343">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10343">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10344">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10345">関数は、 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10345">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10346">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10346">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_swedish_national_identifier"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10348">Keywords_swedish_national_identifier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10348">Keywords_swedish_national_identifier</span></span>
