## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10937">米国の運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10937">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10938">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10939">州に応じて異なる</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10939">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10940">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10941">州によって異なります。たとえば、ニューヨーク:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10941">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10942">ddd ddd ddd のような形式の9桁の数字は一致します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10942">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10943">ddddddddd のように9桁の数字は一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10943">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10944">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10945">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10946">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10947">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10947">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10948">関数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10948">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10949">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10949">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10950">Keyword_us_drivers_license からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10950">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-10951">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10951">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10952">関数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10952">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10953">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10953">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10954">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10954">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10955">Keyword_us_drivers_license のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10955">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10956">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10956">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-10957">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10957">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10958">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10958">DL</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10959">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10959">DLS</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10960">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10960">CDL</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10961">CDLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10961">CDLS</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10962">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10962">ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10963">Rid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10963">IDs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-10964">DL#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-10964">DL#</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11053">米国の個人納税者識別番号 (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11053">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11054">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11055">"9" で始まり、4桁目 (スペースまたはダッシュで書式設定可能) として "7" または "8" を含む9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11055">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11056">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11057">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11057">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11058">数字「9」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11058">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11059">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11059">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11060">スペースまたはダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11060">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11061">「7」または「8」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11061">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11062">1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11062">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11063">スペースまたはダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11063">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11064">4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11064">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11065">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11065">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11066">数字「9」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11066">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11067">2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11067">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11068">「7」または「8」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11068">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11069">5桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11069">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11070">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11071">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11072">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11073">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11073">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11074">関数 Func_formatted_itin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11074">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11075">Keyword_itin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11075">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11076">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11077">関数 Func_unformatted_itin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11077">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11078">Keyword_itin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11078">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11079">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11079">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11080">関数 Func_formatted_itin または Func_unformatted_itin は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11080">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11081">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11081">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11082">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11082">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11083">納税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11083">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11084">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11084">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11085">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11085">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11086">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11086">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11087">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11087">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11088">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11088">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11089">は</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11089">tin</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11095">米国の社会保障番号 (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11095">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11096">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11097">書式設定された、または書式設定されていないパターンの9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11097">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11098">2011より前に発行された場合、SSN の書式には、特定の範囲内にある特定の範囲内にある必要があり、チェックサムがないという厳密な形式があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11098">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11099">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11100">次の4つの異なるパターンで SSNs を検索する4つの関数があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11100">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11101">Func_ssn は、2011 年以前の厳密な書式の SSN を検索します。これはダッシュまたはスペース (ddd-dd-dddd または ddd dd dddd) の形式になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11101">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11102">Func_unformatted_ssn は、2011 年以前の厳密な書式の SSN を検索します。これは 9 桁の連続した数字 (ddddddddd) の形式になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11102">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11103">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn は、2011 年以降の SSN を検索します。これはダッシュまたはスペース (ddd-dd-dddd または ddd dd dddd) の形式になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11103">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11104">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn は、2011 年以降の SSN を検索します。これは 9 桁の連続した数字 (ddddddddd) の形式になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11104">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11105">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11106">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11106">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11107">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11108">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11109">関数 Func_ssn がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11109">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11110">Keyword_ssn のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11110">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11111">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11112">関数 Func_unformatted_ssn は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11112">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11113">Keyword_ssn のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11113">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11114">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11114">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11115">関数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11115">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11116">Keyword_ssn のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11116">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11117">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に 55% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11117">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11118">関数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11118">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11119">Keyword_ssn のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11119">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11120">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11120">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11121">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11121">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11122">SSA 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11122">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11123">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11123">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11124">ソーシャルセキュリティ#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11124">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11125">ソーシャルセキュリティ#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11125">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11126">ソーシャルセキュリティなし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11126">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11127">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11127">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11128">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11128">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11129">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11129">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11130">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11130">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11131">SSN#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11131">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11132">秒#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11132">SS#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11133">SSID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11133">SSID</span></span>
   
## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11134">米国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11134">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11135">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11136">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11136">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11137">パスポート番号機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類で利用でき、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11137">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11138">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11139">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11139">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11140">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11141">9桁の連続した数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11141">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11142">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11143">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11144">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11145">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11146">関数 Func_usa_uk_passport がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11146">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11147">Keyword_passport のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11147">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11168">ウクライナのパスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11168">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11169">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11169">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11170">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11170">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11171">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11171">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11172">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11172">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11173">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11173">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11174">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11174">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11175">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11176">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11176">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11177">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11178">9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11178">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11179">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11180">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11181">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11182">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11183">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11183">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11184">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11184">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11185">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11185">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11186">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11186">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11187">ウクライナのパスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11187">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11188">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11188">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11191">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11191">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11192">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11192">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11193">ウクライナのパスポート国際</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11193">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11194">この機密情報の種類は、で使用する場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11194">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11195">データ損失防止ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11195">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11196">通信コンプライアンスポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11196">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11197">情報ガバナンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11197">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11198">レコード管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11198">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11199">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11199">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11200">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11201">8文字の英数字パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11201">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11202">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11203">8文字の英数字パターン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11203">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11204">2つの文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11204">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11205">6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11205">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11206">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11207">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11207">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f387c-11208">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f387c-11209">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11210">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11210">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f387c-11211">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f387c-11211">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
